subject: RUNNING
HORSE RACING
TENNIS
OLYMPIC GAMES
BASEBALL
lead_paragraph: To the Sports Editor: Re ''The Run of His Life,'' May 21: I usually skip the Sports section, and I am not a runner, but I read every word. Engaged, informed and spiritually uplifted, I kept returning to and reflecting with sadness upon the haunting image of Little Creek.
snippet: Readers sound off on the latest headlines.
